com.stormpath.sdk.organization

Interface CreateOrganizationRequestBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCreateOrganizationRequestBuilder

    public interface CreateOrganizationRequestBuilder
    A Builder to construct CreateOrganizationRequests.
    Since:
    1.0.RC7
    See Also:
    Organizations.newCreateRequestFor(Organization)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CreateOrganizationRequest build()
      Creates a new CreateOrganizationRequest instance based on the current builder state.
      CreateOrganizationRequestBuilder createDirectory()
      Directive indicating that a new Directory shall be created along with this new Organization.
      CreateOrganizationRequestBuilder createDirectoryNamed(String name)
      Directive indicating that a new Directory shall be created along with this new Organization.

    • Method Detail

      • createDirectory

        CreateOrganizationRequestBuilder createDirectory()
        Directive indicating that a new Directory shall be created along with this new Organization. The new Directory will automatically be assigned as the Organization's default Groups and Accounts store.

        The directory will be automatically named based on heuristics to ensure a guaranteed unique name based on the organization. If you want to specify the Directory's name, use the createDirectoryNamed(String) method.

        Returns:
        the builder instance for method chaining.
        See Also:
        createDirectoryNamed(String)

      • createDirectoryNamed

        CreateOrganizationRequestBuilder createDirectoryNamed(String name)
        Directive indicating that a new Directory shall be created along with this new Organization. The new Directory will automatically be assigned as the Organization's default Groups and Accounts store.

        If you don't care about the new Directory's name and want a reasonable default assigned automatically, don't call this method - call createDirectory() instead.

        Returns:
        the builder instance for method chaining.
        See Also:
        createDirectory()

      • build

        CreateOrganizationRequest build()
        Creates a new CreateOrganizationRequest instance based on the current builder state.
        Returns:
        a new CreateOrganizationRequest instance based on the current builder state.
